sentences.english: Oviposit date of the female is in commonly next time menstruation comes before tide 14 days or so.
sentences.chinese: 女性的排卵日期1般鄙人次月經來潮前的14天閣下。

sentences.english: The working team will finish the job next week.
sentences.chinese: 工作班組將鄙人周幹完這活。

sentences.english: In a humble way, I do the same.
Speaking personally I am glad to be a heroic man.
sentences.chinese: 就個人而言，鄙人崇尚英豪。

sentences.english: If you regularly read this blog, you probably can guess how I responded.
sentences.chinese: 如果你經常閱讀鄙人之博客，你可能會猜到答案。

sentences.english: But in my humble opinion, it might be attributed to the paper writing.
sentences.chinese: 然以鄙人愚見，或許可歸因於論文之過。

sentences.english: I think the index will go down slowly. The bottom may be at 800 points.
sentences.chinese: 鄙人認爲指數還將陰跌不止，底部在800點附近。

sentences.english: The above cost can be deducted from the rent when it is due next time.
sentences.chinese: 用度能夠鄙人次付房錢地時分扣除。

sentences.english: Optimism that I was a woman older girls plus early forties .
sentences.chinese: 樂觀地說，鄙人也就是個大齡少女外加早期女光棍。

sentences.english: I don't think the market has any value to invest this year.
sentences.chinese: 鄙人認爲今年的股市不具備投資價值。

sentences.english: I look forward to seeing you at two o'clock next Thursday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我期待鄙人週四下戰書兩點見到你。

sentences.english: I’m not a huge fan of this method, but sometimes brute force is required.
sentences.chinese: 總體上鄙人不常用此方法，但有時死辦法也是必須的。

sentences.english: Our meeting will be next Tuesday at eight o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 我們的集會將鄙人禮拜二八點鐘進行。

sentences.english: These newly-designed devices will appear on the exhibition next month.
sentences.chinese: 這些新計劃的器件將鄙人月的博覽會上展出。

definition: brother (polite appellation for a friend one's age)
to come with a specific purpose in mind

truth to tell/to be quite honest...
